@YapperYu I don't know, I think right now it depends on whether we can defend the $1.495 Tr low on TOTAL. We are kind of in no-man's land.
This chart is worth looking at to see how much you need to gain in order to recover from a given loss. https://t.co/OkU3F4Eu4X

If you have 94% left, you can live to fight another day. 

There are people who lost 90% or even 100% of their portfolios in this downtrend by using leverage much higher up and hodling a leveraged position in a downtrend.

Something to bear in mind when you enter a trade is how bad the outcome will be if you are wrong. 

If you enter a spot position in BTC or Ethereum you might lose 6% of the trade overnight like I just did. 

That's unfortunate, but you still have 94% left.

@FailedTrader_ @SXJU_1M Gambling = no alpha. 

I think given that I held cash down from much higher, going from 100% cash to 66% cash is fine. It's just dumb to give up 4% of my portfolio by overallocating early

@SXJU_1M @FailedTrader_ I think the answer is simple: if you have information, go in in proportion to the amount of informational edge that you have. 

In this case it's not worth a full spot position given the amount of information I have.
@FailedTrader_ I think the call is right, just the correct way to allocate was more cautious.
@KGTachi reclaim 36.5 = rebuy
@KGTachi I think it's fine to wait and see if a bottom forms now and then buy more.
@eth35298683 lol
On the plus side, the advantage of spot positions in majors is that you will not take massive losses when things like this happen. 38k to 35.5k on #Bitcoin is 6% - not great, but also not a disaster.

Lessons here: 

(1) even if it does seem like information is priced in, the market is less efficient than you think

(2) when you see conflicting information, don't go 100%. Go 33%, wait a bit, go another 33%, etc.

OK, Putin/Russia worst case playing out. 

I think the bullish thesis long-term is fine, but I was careless to allocate 100% spot when technicals pointed one way and fundamentals pointed the other. 

I'll sell 66% of my position, if we bottomed I will trade the uptrend. https://t.co/p2T5qgkGCo
